item.title: 癌症是在一月份接受腹部大手术后发现的。目前，公主正处于预防性化疗的早期阶段：
item.description:

item.title: 爆炸性新闻：在一家空头支票公司的股东批准交易后，唐纳德-特朗普的社交媒体业务将公开上市，这将为这位美国前总统带来超过 30 亿美元的潜在意外之财。
item.description:
Breaking news: Donald Trump’s social media business will become publicly listed after shareholders of a blank cheque company approved the deal, unlocking a potential $3bn-plus windfall for the former US president https://t.co/qNFlrpFXrU pic.twitter.com/0UhqoTEspl

— Financial Times (@FT) March 22, 2024

item.title: 💥新 - 布鲁塞尔的律师们正在探索如何绕过欧盟关于购买武器的条约禁令，对国防政策进行重大反思，旨在为重整军备和支持乌克兰释放更多现金。
item.description:
💥NEW - Brussels lawyers are exploring how bypass EU treaty ban on buying arms in major rethink of defence policy aimed at unlocking more cash for rearmament and supporting Ukrainehttps://t.co/XzTuPEWAOb via @ft

— Henry Foy (@HenryJFoy) March 21, 2024

item.title: 克里姆林宫终于承认，俄罗斯在乌克兰的 "特别军事行动 "实际上是一场战争。普京的发言人说，但不是那种会让你在选票上写上 "反对战争！"而被送进监狱的 "战争"--那是完全不同的。
item.description:
The Kremlin has finally admitted Russia's "special military operation" in Ukraine is actually a war.

Not the kind of "war" that will get you sent to jail for writing "No to war!" on a ballot, though – that's totally different, Putin's spokesman sayshttps://t.co/jrCnX3k90H

— max seddon (@maxseddon) March 22, 2024
